content:
Giving tacos as a form of appreciation is a great idea for positive reinforcement. It encourages a friendly atmosphere and makes the challenge more enjoyable.

To make it fair, consider giving tacos to everyone who participates in the challenge. This way, you acknowledge everyone's effort and contribution. However, you could also give extra tacos to those who share particularly effective or insightful content. This will encourage team members to strive for quality and engage more thoughtfully in the challenge.
